data.title: Who Is Novak Djokovic’s Wife? Jelena’s Age & Kids
data.meta_description: Many fans are curious to know more about Novak Djokivic's wife and their children. Here are the details about their relationship history.
data.meta_site_name: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
data.text:
Tennis ace Novak Djokovic recently made history by qualifying for his 10th Wimbledon final in the competition’s latest edition. Despite putting in his best efforts, the Serbian legend ultimately lost the bout to the prodigy Carlos Alcaraz. Now, fans are eager to know more about Djokovic’s personal life, including details about his wife. But who is the World No. 2 married to?

Here is all the available information regarding Novak Djokovic’s relationship with his longtime wife and their children.

Who is Novak Djokovic’s wife in 2024?

The tennis superstar is married to Jelena Djokovic.

The couple are teenage sweethearts who first locked eyes during their schooling days, as per Town & Country magazine. They attended the same high school in Serbia and began dating sometime in the 2000s. As revealed by Jelena Djokovic, their inaugural date occurred at a sports bar in Monte Carlo. Having little experience and money at the time, the pair had to concoct intricate plans just to meet one another. Novak Djokovic and his now-wife Jelena moved in together in Monte Carlo after the latter had completed her graduation.

Having spent most of their adult lives together, the two finally tied the knot in 2014 in Montenegro. Interestingly, the bride-to-be was already expecting her first child with Novak Djokovic at the time of their nuptials. The tennis veteran has since gone on to label their wedding day as the perfect moment, according to Hello! Magazine.

What is Jelena Djokovic’s age?

Born in Belgrade, Serbia, on June 17, 1986, Novak Djokovic’s wife is currently 38, as per Famous Birthdays. She also has an elder sister named Marija. Having attended Bocconi University during her early years, Jelena Djokovic specializes in luxury brand management. She is also responsible for running their family charity, the Novak Djokovic Foundation.

How many kids do Novak Djokovic and Jelena have?

The 37-year-old sportsman and his partner have parented two kids so far. Their elder son, Stefan, was born in October 2014. Meanwhile, the couple welcomed their daughter, Tara, in September 2017.
